Question: While making a low bombing run at about 350 mph (560 km/h), this person's F9F Panther was hit by anti-aircraft fire.
Hints: This person's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
Before becoming an astronaut, this person was an officer in the U.S Navy and served in the Korean War.
This person made seven flights in the X-15 from November 1960 to July 1962.
